title: About
text:
My undergraduate major is Finance, and my am taking the DSAN Program at the Geoergetown University.



My undergraduate major is Finance, and my am taking the DSAN Program at the Geoergetown University.



import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

# Data for plotting
t = np.arange(0.0, 2.0, 0.01)
s = 1 + np.sin(2 * np.pi * t)

fig, ax = plt.subplots()
ax.plot(t, s)

ax.set(xlabel='time (s)', ylabel='voltage (mV)',
       title='About as simple as it gets, folks')
ax.grid()

#fig.savefig("test.png")
plt.show()

title: simple_quarto_website
text:
Footnotes


Here is the footnote.↩︎
Here’s one with multiple blocks.
Subsequent paragraphs are indented to show that they belong to the previous footnote.
The whole paragraph can be indented, or just the first line. In this way, multi-paragraph footnotes work like multi-paragraph list items.↩︎

title: Quarto Presentations
text:
code
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

r = np.arange(0, 2, 0.01)
theta = 2 * np.pi * r
fig, ax = plt.subplots(subplot_kw={'projection': 'polar'})
ax.plot(theta, r)
ax.set_rticks([0.5, 1, 1.5, 2])
ax.grid(True)
plt.show()



https://quarto.org



Kang, Yue, Zhao Cai, Chee-Wee Tan, Qian Huang, and Hefu Liu. 2020. “Natural Language Processing (NLP) in Management Research: A Literature Review.” Journal of Management Analytics 7 (2): 139–72.
